hypothesis_content.title: DeFi Token Liquidity Divergence Before Fed Events
hypothesis_content.statement: In the 24-48 hours before scheduled Fed announcements during NEUTRAL regimes, DeFi tokens (CRV, AAVE, COMP) will show positive price/volume divergence from BTC (outperformance) as 'smart money' positions for potential dovish interpretation affecting yield-bearing assets.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sophisticated traders anticipate Fed impact on risk assets. DeFi tokens with yield components are sensitive to rate expectations. Early positioning creates divergence before the event. This is a pre-event anticipation trade, not a reaction trade.
entry_conditions: CRV/AAVE 4-hour chart shows higher lows while BTC shows flat/lower lows over 24h
DeFi token volume increases 30%+ while BTC volume decreases or remains flat
Entry when DeFi token breaks above 12-hour VWAP with volume >1.5x 20-period average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain OR Fed announcement time (whichever comes first)
exit_conditions.time_exit: Immediately after Fed announcement regardless of P&L

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If DeFi tokens fail to maintain divergence (converge back to BTC correlation) before Fed announcement, or if BTC volatility spikes >3% pre-announcement (dominating all price action).
